facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of population living below the national poverty line increased from 14.8 % in 2000 to 17.3% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of legislative and/or regulatory provisions for managing disaster risk
facts.fact_text: As of 2015, Poland has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Prevalence of undernourishment (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population suffering from hunger was less than 2.5 % in 2016 .

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 17 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 3 per 100,000 live births in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under 5 years of age fell from 9.3 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 4.7 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, 99.69 % of children participated in pre-primary or primary education in the year prior to the official entrance age for primary school

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 13.04 % in 2000 to 28.04% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population using safely managed drinking water services (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 93.88 % of the population used a "safely managed" drinking water serviceâ€“an improved source located on premises, available when needed and free from contamination

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population using safely managed sanitation services (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 77.14 % of the population used a "safely managed" sanitation serviceâ€“a basic facility that safely disposes of human waste

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, more than 95 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, more than 95 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (percent)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita increased from 4.59 % in 2000 to 4.95% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 14.38 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 18.54 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Unemployment rate of population 15 years of age and older
facts.fact_text: The total unemployment rate declined from 16.3 % in 2000 to 4.9% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP (kg per constant 2010 US dollars)
facts.fact_text: The carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP decreased from 0.53 kg in 2000 to 0.31 kg in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, investment in research and development (R&D) stood at 0.97 % of GDP, up from 0.64 % in 2000

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by at least a 2G mobile network (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 100.0 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Labour share of GDP, comprising wages and social protection transfers (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2018, 48.8 % of GDP was from labour, comprising wages and social protection transfers

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameter (PM2.5) was about 20.54 micrograms per cubic metre. This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of legislative and/or regulatory provisions for managing disaster risk
facts.fact_text: As of 2015, Poland has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 14.38 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 18.54 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of legislative and/or regulatory provisions for managing disaster risk
facts.fact_text: As of 2015, Poland has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas (Exclusive Economic Zones) (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2018, 22.6 % of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 91.83 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 87.58 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 91.83 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 87.58 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the intentional homicide rate was 0.68 per 100,000 population.

facts.seriesTitle: Volume of remittances as a proportion of total GCP (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the inflow of personal remittances was 1.42 % of GDP, up from 0.52 % in 1994

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 19.99 % of the population, up from 0.03% of the population in 2001.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of national statistical plans that are fully funded
facts.fact_text: As of 2018, Poland has developed national statistical plans that are fully funded.
